data: Half-way up the east coast of Scotland, the estuary of the North Lour cuts a wide cleft in an edge of the Lowlands, and flows into the North Sea among the sands and salmon nets.
Scotland | North Lour | Lowlands | North Sea
east coast of Scotland | estuary of the North Lour | Lowlands | North Sea
HALF-WAY up the east coast of Scotland, the estuary of the North Lour cuts a wide cleft in an edge of the Lowlands, and flows into the North Sea among the sands and salmon nets.
